paragraph.paragraph:
A few commands give the possibility to manage the development windows globally. They are located both in the
20_window_menu.xml Window menu and in the main toolbar.

list.item:
New window: this command (
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_new_development_tool_color.gif ) creates a new empty development window. Note that it is also possible to
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/05_general_interface_description/10_general_interface_mechanisms/10_pick_and_drop.xml drop a class or a feature on it to create a development window that is immediately centered on the dropped item.

Raise unsaved windows: this command raises all the development windows that have not been saved. It may be combined with the Minimize all command to find easily which development windows need to be saved.
